name: Ghosts of New Jersey (Work-In-Progress)
description:
This is an entry for Gentle Ghost Jam, Cryptid Game Jam, Devtober, and Bara Game Jam.

And it is currently in Work in Progress - only the PROLOGUE is completed.

If you want to read the entire story, go to the github repo of this game, and look into the text folder.

It's a NVL visual novel about two male spirits (one cisgender and one transgender) teaming up with other spirits in afterlife to fight against the Jersey Devil in the Pine Barren of New Jersey.

Almost all the texts are written by this discord user named Senshi Sun.
